SEARCH
Module com.psymk6
Package com.psymk6.controllers

Class PauseController

java.lang.Object
com.psymk6.abstracts.ClickableButton
com.psymk6.controllers.PauseController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Drawable
public class PauseController extends ClickableButton implements Drawable
The PauseController class handles the functionality of the pause button in the SnakeGame. It extends ClickableButton and implements Drawable, providing methods to draw the pause button and handle mouse clicks to pause the game.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Mateusz Klocek

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public void draw(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc)
      Draws the pause button on the specified GraphicsContext. The button is drawn with 50% opacity.
      Specified by:
      draw in interface Drawable
      Parameters:
      gc - The GraphicsContext on which the pause button is drawn.

    • setClick

      public void setClick(GameController gameController, double mouseX, double mouseY)
      Handles the mouse click event on the pause button. If the click occurs within the button bounds, it toggles the game's pause state.
      Specified by:
      setClick in class ClickableButton
      Parameters:
      gameController - The GameController instance associated with the game.
      mouseX - The x-coordinate of the mouse click.
      mouseY - The y-coordinate of the mouse click.
